languages.text: {n}Внимание ксеноса переключается на кого-то другого.{/n} "Ты оказался весьма полезным, мон-кай. Поразительное свойство для вашего племени". {n}Он обращается к Ахиллеасу, валяющемуся рядом — бледное лицо искажено ужасом и болью, распахнутые глаза полны слез.{/n} "Думаю, я найду тебе применение и дальше".

traits.locale_text: {n}Внимание ксеноса переключается на кого-то другого.{/n} "Ты оказался весьма полезным, мон-кай. Поразительное свойство для вашего племени". {n}Он обращается к Ахиллеасу, валяющемуся рядом — бледное лицо искажено ужасом и болью, распахнутые глаза полны слез.{/n} "Думаю, я найду тебе применение и дальше".
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

languages.text: {n}Le xénos porte son attention vers quelqu'un d'autre.{/n} « Vous vous êtes montré très utile, mon-keigh. Une qualité étonnante pour les gens de votre espèce. » {n}Il s'adresse à Achilleas qui est allongé non loin de là, son visage blafard distordu sous l'effet de la terreur et de la douleur, les yeux écarquillés et pleins de larmes.{/n} « Je vous trouverai peut-être d'autres usages à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos porte son attention vers quelqu'un d'autre.{/n} « Vous vous êtes montré très utile, mon-keigh. Une qualité étonnante pour les gens de votre espèce. » {n}Il s'adresse à Achilleas qui est allongé non loin de là, son visage blafard distordu sous l'effet de la terreur et de la douleur, les yeux écarquillés et pleins de larmes.{/n} « Je vous trouverai peut-être d'autres usages à l'avenir. »
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将注意力转向了其他人。{/n}“你已经证明了你是个有用的猴子。对猴子来说，这确实挺不容易的。”{n}他对躺在附近的阿吉里亚斯开了口。阿吉里亚斯就躺在附近，苍白的脸因恐惧和痛苦而扭曲，眼睛瞪得大大的，满是泪水。{/n}“以后你说不定还有别的用途。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将注意力转向了其他人。{/n}“你已经证明了你是个有用的猴子。对猴子来说，这确实挺不容易的。”{n}他对躺在附近的阿吉里亚斯开了口。阿吉里亚斯就躺在附近，苍白的脸因恐惧和痛苦而扭曲，眼睛瞪得大大的，满是泪水。{/n}“以后你说不定还有别的用途。”
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}異種族は他の人物に目を向けた。{/n}「ずいぶん有能じゃないか、モン＝ケイ。お前のような種族にしては珍しいほどにな」{n}彼が話しかけたのは近くに倒れているアキレアスだった。その青白い顔は恐怖と苦痛に歪み、目を大きく見開いて涙を流している。{/n}「お前には将来、他の使い道があるかもしれん」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は他の人物に目を向けた。{/n}「ずいぶん有能じゃないか、モン＝ケイ。お前のような種族にしては珍しいほどにな」{n}彼が話しかけたのは近くに倒れているアキレアスだった。その青白い顔は恐怖と苦痛に歪み、目を大きく見開いて涙を流している。{/n}「お前には将来、他の使い道があるかもしれん」
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos richtet seine Aufmerksamkeit auf jemand anderen.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch als ziemlich nützlich erwiesen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Eine unheimliche Eigenschaft Eurer Art." {n}Er spricht mit Achilleas, der in der Nähe liegt und dessen blasses Gesicht vor Angst und Schmerz verzerrt ist. Achilleas' Augen sind dabei weit aufgerissen und tränen stark.{/n} "Vielleicht kann ich Euch später noch gebrauchen."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos richtet seine Aufmerksamkeit auf jemand anderen.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch als ziemlich nützlich erwiesen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Eine unheimliche Eigenschaft Eurer Art." {n}Er spricht mit Achilleas, der in der Nähe liegt und dessen blasses Gesicht vor Angst und Schmerz verzerrt ist. Achilleas' Augen sind dabei weit aufgerissen und tränen stark.{/n} "Vielleicht kann ich Euch später noch gebrauchen."
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}El xenos desvía su atención a otra parte.{/n} «Has demostrado ser muy útil, mon-keigh. Una cualidad asombrosa para alguien de tu especie». {n}Está hablando con Achilleas, que también yace en el suelo con el rostro lívido contraído por el terror y el dolor; sus ojos, abiertos como platos, están empañados por las lágrimas.{/n} «Quizá te encuentre alguna otra utilidad en el futuro».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos desvía su atención a otra parte.{/n} «Has demostrado ser muy útil, mon-keigh. Una cualidad asombrosa para alguien de tu especie». {n}Está hablando con Achilleas, que también yace en el suelo con el rostro lívido contraído por el terror y el dolor; sus ojos, abiertos como platos, están empañados por las lágrimas.{/n} «Quizá te encuentre alguna otra utilidad en el futuro».
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: {n}Zeno, başka biriyle ilgilenmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten de işe yarar çıktın mon-keigh. Türünden beklenmeyen, acayip bir özellik." {n}Yakınlarda yerde uzanan Achilleas'la konuşuyor. Achilleas'ın dehşet ve acı içindeki yüzünün beti benzi atmış, fal taşına dönen gözlerindense yaş akıyor.{/n} "Gelecekte de işime yararsın belki."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos turns his attention to someone else.{/n} "You have proven quite useful, mon-keigh. An uncanny quality for your kind." {n}He is speaking to Achilleas, who is lying nearby, his pale face contorted in terror and pain, and his eyes wide open and tearful.{/n} "I may find other uses for you in the future."

Achilleas'ın dehşet ve acı içindeki yüzünün beti benzi atmış; fal taşına dönen gözlerindense yaş akıyor.{/n} "Gelecekte de işime yararsın belki."
traits.speaker: AhilleasAbductionMarazhai
